column4: How can I install lame in breezy? Does anyone knows what repository should I use?
I tried, but seems that I dont have the right repositories, because doing aptitude search lame i got nothing
do you know how to enable the uni/multiverse repos?
I think yes, but I would say that I did something wrong, because I still can not have this working. can you please help me with that?
and are you using ubuntu as in gnome?
gksudo mousepad /etc/apt/sources.list, then add the line deb http://<countrycode (eg gb)>.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu breezy universe multiverse
just deb line, or deb-src too?
you can do the deb-src too, but unesss you're actually gonna use the sdources, it's rather pointless
ok, later aptitude update, and let see what happens ...
great man. Thanks a lot, and have a fantastic 2007!
